item.title: Worksheet
item.description: Worksheet # Use the prompts from this worksheet to write about your own life while shielding, or to interview someone else about their story. Would you like to share your story at The Shielding (anonymously)? We’d love to hear from you! You can reach us at: theshielding@protonmail.com. item.title: Take Part
item.description: Take Part # Are you, or have you been, shielding? Or maybe you know someone who shields? If so, we would love to hear from you! Anonymous stories are welcome. Fill out the form below, and we’ll be in touch. Name (pseudonym fine): Email: What interview format would you prefer? item.title: About
item.description: About # The Shielding is run by a small group of people with one thing in common: all of us have been shielding since early on in the current COVID-19 pandemic. We started The Shielding in March 2022 out of a sense of bafflement and urgency. Bafflement, because it seemed that the outside world had fallen largely into pandemic denialism. Even though in many regions, infections numbers are still intolerably high.
